text: BLS AG is a Swiss train company. It was founded in 2006. == Trains == BLS AG currently has 4 kinds of trains in operation. Name Top Speed Manufacturer RABe 528 – «MIKA» 160 km/h Stadler Rail RABe 515 120-200km/h Stadler Rail RABe 535 160 km/h Bombardier RABe 525 140 km/h Bombardier == Boats == BLS also operates boats in the Brienz Lake and the Thun Lake of Switzerland. == Other websites == * BLS AG official website Category:2006 establishments in Switzerland Category:Transport companies of Switzerland Category:Railway companies Category:Rail transport in Switzerland
title: BLS AG
